title: Invoice System Schema Inconsistencies July 12 2025
description: High architectural failure: Missing critical invoice system tables (invoice_payment_links, invoice_email_logs) and column naming inconsistencies (total vs total_price) in production database. Root cause: Incomplete database schema migration and inconsistent naming conventions. Required emergency SQL fixes for production system. Prevention: Implement comprehensive schema validation and naming convention enforcement. Test database migrations thoroughly in staging before production deployment.
